title: Command Injection
description: The code constructs a command string using user input from the combo box and executes it without proper validation or sanitization.
fix: Validate and sanitize all user inputs before constructing command strings. Use parameterized commands or avoid shell execution where possible.

reasoning.pattern: User input is directly used to construct a command string that is executed by the system.
reasoning.exploit_example: An attacker could select an option in the combo box that includes malicious characters or commands, leading to arbitrary command execution on the system.
